ygData.subject: Cheap Rivervale Merchants
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, the prices I m getting paid for fire beetle eyes is barely over 1 silver a piece ... so I know I m getting gipped.  I know I got more for the same thing in
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, the prices I'm getting paid for fire beetle eyes is barely over 1
silver a piece ... so I know I'm getting gipped. I know I got more for
the same thing in Freeport from the bard guild. Same with the snake
teeth and skins. I have barely 5 gold or so (can't remember exactly
right now) after an entire level and a half of hunting in Rivervale ...
and no buying anything. I've either died or foraged food & water for
myself. I'm still using all my newbie stuff.

I'm killing bixies as much as I can ... which isn't hard ... they crawl
out of the woodwork to attack me, lol.

Safe travels,
Wynsong
Woodelf Bard, Level 3 (and a half! ;-)
Rivervale, Quellious

Message: 16
Date: Wed, 7 Jul 1999 14:02:47 -0400
From: "Fun Bob" <fun-bob@...>
Subject: Re: Rivervale to Qeynos?

Just one more piece of advice. From what I remember of being level 3,
anything you can kill's loot sucks. I dont think your getting gipped as
much
as the loot just sucks....
